pages.title: What operating system do you use?

questions.name: ac1
questions.title: If you strongly favor an option in a Quadratic Voting survey, you can cast more than one upvotes on the option.

questions.name: ac2
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, you can cast as many votes on an option as you like.

questions.name: ac3
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, one vote costs one voice credit.

questions.name: ac4
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, you must use up all the voice credits available to you in the given budget.
